text: Sixty Years of Arkham House is a bibliography of books published from 1939 to 1999 under the imprints of Arkham House, Mycroft & Moran and Stanton & Lee. It was released in 1999 by Arkham House in an edition of approximately 3,500 copies. The book updates Thirty Years of Arkham House, 1939-1969: A History and Bibliography adding extensive biographical and bibliographical notes. ==References== * * Category:1999 books Category:American non-fiction books
title: Sixty Years of Arkham House
